bibl.title: Rome and India. The Ancient Sea Trade
bibl.note: Background. - Ports of the Red Sea. - The Arabia-India Trade. - Taxes and Traders/Merchants.
SIDEBOTHAM Steven E., Ports of the Red Sea and the Arabia-India Trade.
Vimala BEGLEY and Richard Daniel DE PUMA (Edd.), Rome and India. The Ancient Sea Trade (Madison, 1991) pp. 12-38, 22 figg., 4 cartes.
